description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. House of Cockroach is 3D shooting game. Simply enter the house with full of cockroaches and there will be various rooms with 14 missions to completed. Using 3 different weapons (reflect gun, machine gun and bomb) to win against cockroaches.Build a highest score or challenge your friends and beat their score.
